thread.title: Guess How Much "Indiawale" Were Being Paid On Bigg Boss
thread.title_full: Guess How Much "Indiawale" Were Being Paid On Bigg Boss

title: Guess How Much "Indiawale" Were Being Paid On Bigg Boss
text:
facebook 361 SHARES 
Apart from saving sinking careers, Bigg Boss is also known to be a quick and easy way to make some money. Each celebrity contestant gets not just a signing amount (in lakhs), but also gets paid for every week that they survive inside the house. 
This time, with commoners (or Indiawale ) being a part of the house, the contestants were a mix of unknown faces and celebrities. What was quite unfair was the huge difference in the amounts being paid. 
Indiawale managed to steal the show from day one, with Manveer Gurjar emerging as the winner. However none of them were paid a signing amount and they received Rs. 25,000 for every week that they stayed in the house. When compared to the six-figure money the celebrities were making this seems quite unfair. 
Now that Manveer has won, we hope this changes next season.
